name: DEAD TASTE (1HomeAloneGames)
description:
DEAD TASTE is a small and free one man hobby FPS project.

It is like a zombie splatter adventure but the main goal is just killing Zombies. Be aggressive or sneak around, it is up to you.

Repair your motorhome vehicle and leave the desert town to find a better life.

DT was programmed in a low level 3d engine, everything is done from scratch. From gunplay to ragdoll movements. Some dev information can be found here: rayp's old school fast zombie FPS project - lite-C Forums (opserver.de) (see Video description)

Game was designed to run smooth on old GPU's, no need for a high end gamer pc. In fact the project was created with a GPU from 2008 (tested with 50fps+ ATI Radeon HD4800 in 1024x768 fullscreen).

Special thanks to SuperKu (pathfinding algo), Boh_Havoc (SC shader framework) and 3run.

First release ever (wip, beta), did my best testing and finding any bugs.

Adults (18+) only. Strong violence, bad language, drugs and nudity.
